reference.title: Project Selection dialog
reference.shortdesc: Allows you to select the Android project containing the application to be run by a run configuration. This dialog appears when you click Browse next to the Project field on the Main tab of an Android Application using Studio for Android run configuration.

section.p: This dialog displays the set of projects associated with the current workspace. Select the appropriate project and click OK. Note that you cannot create a run configuration that references a project outside of the current workspace.
